sentences.sContent: Objective:To study the protective effect of Weishusan on small intestinal lesions induced by indomethacin in rats.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective:To study the protective effect of Weishusan on small intestinal lesions induced by indomethacin in rats.
sentences.sCn: 目的：研究胃舒散对消炎痛所致大鼠小肠损伤的保护作用及机制。

trans.tranOther: a drug administered orally to relieve pain, fever, and inflammation, esp in rheumatoid arthritis
